# Angular Portfolio Project - Copilot Instructions

This is an Angular portfolio project created with TypeScript, routing, and SCSS styling.

## Project Structure
- Angular CLI-based project structure
- TypeScript configuration
- SCSS for styling
- Routing enabled
- Component-based architecture

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Angular style guide conventions
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Implement responsive design
- Use Angular Material for UI components when needed
- Follow component-based architecture patterns
